title: FS: 20 T206 Beaters (Piedmont and PB-Scans are big) 3 Cards Added
author: jburl

posts.post_title: FS: 20 T206 Beaters (Piedmont and PB-Scans are big) 3 Cards Added
posts.post_content:
Please PM with which cards you want. First come, first serve. $3 flat shipping. ($1 for PWE) Will take $160 for the remaining 10. Make me an offer if it hasn't sold yet.

3 New Added:
T206 Piedmont 150KidElberfeld(Portrait, New York)Card presents well on front, nice centering. Back is damaged. See scan  $30.00 New York Highlanders
